ChatMapperProject.Title: Standard Project
ChatMapperProject.Description: Default project with two actors and default asset fields.

Field.Hint: A name to reference this actor.
Field.Title: Name

Field.Hint: A collection of image files that represent this actor.
Field.Title: Pictures

Field.Hint: A short description of what makes this actor unique.
Field.Title: Description

Field.Hint: Mark this box if this actor is the main player character.
Field.Title: IsPlayer

Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Bobby! You stood me up last night, you jerk!|I swear to God, I’m going to grab a pound of sugar and go all Tony Montana on your ass, you -|Oh, it’s just you.

Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: This is a message for Mr. Sanchez from Dr. Porta’s office.|Mr. Sanchez has once again missed his appointment for his check-up this morning.|Please have him call us at his earliest convenience to reschedule.|I shouldn’t have to stress how important regular controls are for an individual with his condition,|so please contact Dr. Porta immediately.

Field.Value: “Yard sale fair at Town Square - Our junk could be your treasure”.|I must have left this here to remember... Something.|Oh, that’s right!|The LPs guy... What was his name?|Bah, I’ll find him here, I guess.|Hey! It even has a small map of town with the fair marked on it!
